author: giannibacoo
title: Sublime Gadgets: Apple AirPods by Colorware
text: Apple AirPods by ColorwareThe ultra lightweight Apple AirPods are fully wireless in-ear headphones that offer a reliable wireless connection, effortless pairing with Apple devices, high quality audio and good call quality. The included compact magnetic charging case quickly charges the buds giving them a 24 hour battery…Check out Apple AirPods by Colorware at its original source.
